alert.note: Alert for Wayne (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 17 at 11:27AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 130 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding of small streams and ditches is expected. * WHERE...Southern Wayne county. * WHEN...Until 130 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1125 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause minor flooding of small streams and ditches. Between 2 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are expected over the area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Winside and Hoskins.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
